alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 04 at 1:28AM PST until January 04 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Deer Creek at Roseburg affecting Central Douglas County zone. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Deer Creek at Roseburg. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 8.1 feet. This is action stage. - Forecast...Deer Creek reaching flood stage is looking less likely, but may still be reached with any significant additional rainfall. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM PST.
